name: Confused
description: You can't tell friend from foe. They are just looking all the same to you!
resist: Before using a move, roll 1d6. On a 1, you fail to execute it and hit yourself in confusion (roll Str + 3 as damage dice against themselves, resisted by their def. Minimum of 1 damage).
effect: If the subject makes an attack, after final damage calculation the subject hits themselves in confusion.
duration: Roll Insight at the start of the turn. Once you have a total of 6 successes or 4 rounds have passed, your character snaps out of it.
